text: Harvey Weinstein has apologised for using statements by Meryl Streep and Jennifer Lawrence in an effort to dismiss a class action sexual misconduct lawsuit against him. Six women are suing Weinstein and what they call the “ Weinstein Sexual Enterprise ”, which they say includes his brother Bob and their co - founded studio The Weinstein Company, claiming they conspired to conceal Weinstein ’ s widespread alleged sexual harassment. The plaintiffs argue that, due to the scale of sexual misconduct allegations against Weinstein, the producer ’ s “ sexual enterprise ” should be considered an organised crime group.
